front.title: IODEF-extension to support structured cybersecurity information

abstract.t: This document extends the Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) defined in RFC 5070 [RFC5070] to facilitate enriched cybersecurity information exchange among cybersecurity entities by embedding structured information formatted by specifications, including CAPEC[TM] [CAPEC], CEE[TM] [CEE], CPE[TM] [CPE], CVE(R) [CVE], CVRF [CVRF], CVSS [CVSS], CWE[TM] [CWE], CWSS[TM] [CWSS], ISO/ IEC 19770-2 [ISOIEC19770-2], OCIL [OCIL], OVAL(R) [OVAL], XCCDF [XCCDF], and XDAS [XDAS].
